author: Blake Schuster
title: UFC News: Dana White Explains Plans for Future Fights After 249 Cancellation
description: UFC 249  is officially off. ESPN convinced UFC president  Dana White  to finally postpone the event that was slated to take place on a Native American reservation in California after ...
content:
Julio Cortez/Associated Press
UFC 249 is officially off. ESPN convinced UFC president Dana White to finally postpone the event that was slated to take place on a Native American reservation in California after the Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York, shut … [+2411 chars]
